mapper.select:
SELECT ti.id, ti.title, ti.simple_description AS simpleDescription, ti.creator_id AS creatorId, u.nickname AS creator_nickname, ti.enter_description AS enterDescription, ti.thumbnail_image AS thumbnailImage, ti.created_at AS createdAt, ti.blind_status AS blindStatus,
GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tit.theme_id ORDER BY tit.theme_id) AS themeIds,
COALESCE(like_counts.like_count, 0) AS likeCount,
COALESCE(member_counts.member_count, 0) AS memberCount,
latest_msg.latest_message AS latestMessage,
COALESCE(chat_counts.chat_count, 0) AS chatCount
FROM travel_info ti
LEFT JOIN travel_info_theme tit ON ti.id = tit.travel_info_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT travel_info_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM travel_info_like GROUP BY travel_info_id ) like_counts ON ti.id = like_counts.travel_info_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_id AS travel_info_id, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM group_user WHERE group_type = 'TRAVELINFO' GROUP BY group_id ) member_counts ON ti.id = member_counts.travel_info_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cr.group_id AS travel_info_id, cm.message AS latest_message FROM chat_room cr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT chat_id, message, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY chat_id ORDER BY created_at DESC) as rn FROM chat_message ) cm ON cr.id = cm.chat_id AND cm.rn = 1 WHERE cr.group_type = 'TRAVELINFO' ) latest_msg ON ti.id = latest_msg.travel_info_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cr.group_id AS travel_info_id, COUNT(cm.id) AS chat_count FROM chat_room cr LEFT JOIN chat_message cm ON cr.id = cm.chat_id WHERE cr.group_type = 'TRAVELINFO' AND cm.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY cr.group_id ) chat_counts ON ti.id = chat_counts.travel_info_id
LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id=ti.creator_id
WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM travel_info_theme tit2 WHERE tit2.travel_info_id = ti.id AND tit2.theme_id IN
#{theme}
)
AND (ti.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR ti.simple_description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
GROUP BY ti.id, ti.title, ti.simple_description, ti.creator_id, ti.enter_description, ti.thumbnail_image, ti.created_at, ti.blind_status, like_counts.like_count, member_counts.member_count, latest_msg.latest_message, chat_counts.chat_count
ORDER BY chat_counts.chat_count DESC, ti.created_at DESC
ORDER BY like_counts.like_count DESC, ti.created_at DESC
ORDER BY ti.created_at DESC
ORDER BY ti.id ASC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
